item.description: Change 'type' or 'strategy' above to try different Component Types, like Sequencer

items.content: Welcome to personal trainer. What do you want to do today? You can ask for cardio, yoga, strength training etc.
Welcome to personal trainer for guided workouts. You can ask for stretching workouts, cardio workouts etc.
Hi there? What kind of workout do you plan to do today? Cardio? HIIT? Yoga? Just ask for any type of workout.
